mapper.select: SELECT ITEMDESIGN_NM as itemDesignName ,PAYMENT_TYPE_GB as paymentTypeGb ,SUM(PAYMENT_TOTAL_WON) as totalCash ,count(*) as countCash ,SUM(PAYMENT_TOTAL_WON) as totalCard ,count(*) as countCard ,PAYMENT_DT as paymentDate FROM CRM_PAYMENT_TB WHERE PAYMENT_DT = #{paymentDate} GROUP BY ITEMDESIGN_NM, PAYMENT_TYPE_GB
